SEARCH

Class GraphScreen

java.lang.Object
GraphScreen
public class GraphScreen extends Object
The GraphScreen class provides a user interface for plotting and managing graphs. It allows for the creation, editing, and visualization of 2D graphs, including the application of various regression models (e.g., polynomial, exponential, logistic). Graphs can be saved, and the UI supports interactive updates of regression type and data points. Uses XChart for plotting and supports saving graphs with rendered previews. Dependencies: - XChart library for chart plotting. - Apache Commons Math for regression model fitting. - RegressionModels package for handling regression logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphScreen

      public GraphScreen(MainScreen mscreen, Graph graphToEdit)
      Constructs a GraphScreen with a reference to the main screen and a graph to edit. If no graph is provided, creates a new empty graph.
      Parameters:
      mscreen - The parent MainScreen object.
      graphToEdit - The graph object to edit; if null, a blank graph is used.

    • GraphScreen

      public GraphScreen(MainScreen mscreen)
      Alternate constructor that creates an empty editable graph.
      Parameters:
      mscreen - The parent MainScreen object.

  • Method Details

    • plot

      public void plot(Graph graph)
      Displays a JFrame containing the interactive graph plot and control panel for: - Editing points - Selecting regression models - Connecting points - Saving the graph - Viewing best-fit equations
      Parameters:
      graph - The graph object to display and edit.

    • updateFromInput

      private static void updateFromInput(Graph graph, String title, String newPoints, String regType, boolean connect, Component parent)
      Builds or updates a Graph object based on user input: - Parses input point text - Sets regression type - Handles polynomial degree prompts
      Parameters:
      graph - The graph object to modify.
      title - The title for the graph.
      newPoints - A string containing points in (x,y) format per line.
      regType - The regression model name.
      connect - Whether to connect points with lines.
      parent - The UI component for error dialogs.

    • drawGraph

      private static org.knowm.xchart.XYChart drawGraph(Graph graph, Frame frame)
      Draws and returns an XYChart representation of a Graph object. Applies padding and calculates bounds from the data. Also renders: - Scatter points - Regression lines (if applicable) - X and Y axes (y=0 and x=0)
      Parameters:
      graph - The Graph object to render.
      frame - The parent frame used to sync colors with the chart background.
      Returns:
      An XYChart ready to be used in an XChartPanel.

    • save

      private static void save(org.knowm.xchart.XYChart saveChart, String filepath) throws IOException
      Saves a chart as a PNG image file. Also updates graph metadata and serializes it.
      Parameters:
      chart - The chart to save.
      imagePath - Path to save the image (without extension).
      Throws:
      IOException - if image saving or file writing fails.
